title: Chat Restricted for Defending a Friend
body:
Starting off in champion select, I was playing with 2 of my friends, one of which bans kayn pretty much every game. So, he banned kayn, and it was in the last few seconds of the timer so he didn't realize someone had him selected. He in no way intentionally banned the person's champion, and they didn't seem to mind much so everything was cool. Fast forward to in game, the person decided to play xin zhao instead and wasn't doing very well, and decided to bring up how my friend (playing morgana) caused him to do badly because they banned kayn. Xin stressed that morgana must have done it intentionally and said we were trolling. I defended my friend, saying that it made no sense to say everything was okay before, but now blame us as soon as he does badly. Xin continued saying we were trolling because we didn't want to surrender when the rest of the team wasn't doing very well, even though we were still doing well and thought we had a chance. Xin started refusing to group with us and ignoring the enemies coming into our base, so I told him that he was trolling because he was giving up, and we were legitimately trying to play the game. Here are the chat logs riot gave me for why I was chat restricted:

Game 1
NinjaCharizard: rip
NinjaCharizard: ty
NinjaCharizard: why
NinjaCharizard: stop going so deep just farm up dude
NinjaCharizard: just farm
NinjaCharizard: bot lane was gonna go in you shouldnt have chased
NinjaCharizard: just play passive
NinjaCharizard: bot in winning hard
NinjaCharizard: *bot is
NinjaCharizard: ok well farm as much as you can without dying
NinjaCharizard: thats all u can do rn
NinjaCharizard: its ok
NinjaCharizard: dude dont try to bring that shit up as if you lost just cause you didnt get kayn
NinjaCharizard: it was an accident
NinjaCharizard: what reason does he have to ban your champion
NinjaCharizard: LMAO so it wasnt a big deal then, but as soon as you feed its his fault
NinjaCharizard: sure buddy
NinjaCharizard: youre the troll
NinjaCharizard: ^
NinjaCharizard: reporting you for attitude
NinjaCharizard: i have my own vote for a reason lmao
NinjaCharizard: im not surrendering
NinjaCharizard: complain all you want
NinjaCharizard: idc
NinjaCharizard: were not trolling>
NinjaCharizard: if anything you are
NinjaCharizard: cause youre giving up
NinjaCharizard: thats reportable
NinjaCharizard: so
NinjaCharizard: i love how were "trolling" because were actually trying to play the game
NinjaCharizard: ok buddy
NinjaCharizard: idc
NinjaCharizard: report xin trolling
NinjaCharizard: youre sitting in jungle while they take base
NinjaCharizard: hes been calling bot lane troll all game because morg accidently banned kayn
NinjaCharizard: it was a literal accident
NinjaCharizard: we apologized profusely

I can see that I had an accusatory tone when talking to him, but I really didn't say anything that was insulting whatsoever. I told him it was an accident that my friend banned his champion, that we didn't want to surrender, and that he was trolling because he was giving up. I'm really just confused as to how this amounts to a chat restriction, especially considering I've had no prior restrictions.

replies.body:
How is this worthy of a ban?
Riot are over-sensitive when it comes to stuff like this.

One of the few cases I see to be legitimate. Magic, if you consider this toxic you must have an extremely low threshold...

If these are the actual chat logs and you were not int'ing or anything, I see absolutely nothing wrong here. This clearly does not warrant a ban in my opinion, and I've easily seen 300+ of these.

> Chat Restricted

FTFY

What you are doing and why you think it is justified does not matter, flaming is flaming.

The only way to beat trolls is to not play their game. Ignore and get on with things.

I understand that, but I don't get how this is considered flaming when I didn't insult anyone. I just told him he was trolling and said he shouldn't try to say we caused him to do badly. I should've ignored him but I don't see this as toxic or flaming.

> [{quoted}](name=NinjaCharizard,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GBUtTiAL,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-03-12T05:10:06.520+0000)
>
> I understand that, but I don't get how this is considered flaming when I didn't insult anyone. I just told him he was trolling and said he shouldn't try to say we caused him to do badly. I should've ignored him but I don't see this as toxic or flaming.

It is borderline, not the most offensive, but still not polite at all. Have you had previous warnings or restrictions?
No I haven't, which is why I thought it was odd that this got me a restriction.
